info.game_comments:
Sam Ott game 2.
First game of Season 20.
New title graphics.
Champions return until they lose ("sky's the limit" rule) effective beginning this game.

(1, 1).clue: Documentary photographer Garry Winogrand left behind some 500,000 of these he never printed
